Functions

01000_mcMap
[Normal_Client_API]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_Map4k ()
 TestCase_BC00101_SessionhandleNullPointer ()
 TestCase_BC00102_MapinfoNullPointer ()
 TestCase_BC00103_SessionhandleInvalidId ()
 TestCase_BC00104_SessionhandleInvalidDevice ()
 TestCase_BC00105_MultipleMappingsOfSameBuffer ()
 TestCase_BC00106_MapAReadonlyBuffer ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in registry as 05010000000000000000000000000000.trst
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free

Generic preconditions (setup)
Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. They are executed always in front of every single test case.

  • open device using the default ID by calling mcOpenDevice()
  • allocate a WSM buffer (4k)
  • open a session to the Trusted Application

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • close session to the Trusted Application
  • free allocated memory of WSM buffer
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_Map4k (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
mcMap does not map additional bulk memory.
Test Steps:
TLC maps additional Bulk memory to Trusted Application
Verification:
returns MC_DRV_OK.
returned Buffer length is equal to requested length.
Test output is OK.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No

TestCase_BC00106_MapAReadonlyBuffer (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
mcMap handles a readonly memory area mapping.
Test Steps:
TLC tries to map read-only data to Trusted Application
Verification:
returns MC_DRV_ERR_BULK_MAPPING.
The bulk buffer cannot be mapped because it points to readonly data.
Test output is OK.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
